ua.edu.sumdu.j2se.Yermolenko.tasks.Model

Class TasksService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ua.edu.sumdu.j2se.Yermolenko.tasks.Model.TasksService

  • public class TasksService
extends java.lang.Object
    Class TasksService relates to Model according to MVC pattern. Describes the logic of the program.

      • editTaskModel

        public void editTaskModel(Task task)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Logic for task editing. Works with user's input. If user chooses 6 - he can set a new task title 7 - he can set a new task time 8 - he can set activity of the task If user entered another digit he would start again from this menu.
        Parameters:
        task - the specific task from a list of tasks.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if can't read the string from a console

      • confirmation

        Returns:

        Throws:

      • notifyService

        public void notifyService()
        Create a daemon thread for notification when it is the time of a task. Gets a task with nearest time execute comparing to current time. Then compares task execute time and current time. As method ignores milliseconds, current time can be later than actual task execute time, so this method prints task time in console. If prints a notifying, sleeps for a 1 second for correct method working. Without sleep method prints a notify several times because this program works too quickly. If a task has just been added or changed, field daemonWork set to false. When the daemonWork is false, this method begins work with an updated task list.
